title: #146: Profiling the Weather and Crime with Dr. Elizabeth Austin
description:
The RCP team interview Dr Elizabeth Austin, the forensic meteorologist at the top of her profession ahead of her new true crime show ‘Storm of Suspicion’.

Storm of Suspicion premieres October 7 on the Weather Channel. 

 https://youtu.be/XFcbH_A9rSs



Buy Dr. Austin’s book Treading on Thin Air

https://www.amazon.com/Treading-Thin-Air-Atmospheric-Meteorology/dp/1681774038
